Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $13,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects its high value but also offers you a significant discount compared to its market rate. I am confident it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
